localResource.name: Storage_Domain_Name
localResource.label: Storage_Domain_Name
localResource.queryString: Select distinct cast(v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id as varchar), detach_date, CASE WHEN detach_date IS NULL THEN storage_domain_name ELSE storage_domain_name || ' (Detached on ' || cast(detach_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name from v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view, v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view WHERE v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.storage_domain_id = v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type = CASE cast($P{P_Storage_Type} as int) WHEN NULL THEN v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type WHEN -1 THEN v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type ELSE cast($P{P_Storage_Type} as int) END AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view a GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id, a.datacenter_id) AND v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.history_id in (SELECT max(b.history_id) FROM v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view b GROUP BY b.storage_domain_id) AND create_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (delete_date IS NULL OR (delete_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND delete_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) AND attach_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (detach_date IS NULL OR (detach_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND detach_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) $P!{is_deleted} ORDER BY detach_date DESC, combo_name
